𒋥 < 𒈥 > 𒋥 ≠ 𒋾
𒋥 Rad
𒈥 MaRad

𒋥 RAD / RAT
𒈥 ᵍrad grind 𒋥𒋥

𒋥 šita₃ šitan Stange "pipe" 𒋥 šita₃ šitan ὀχετός water-channel

𒋥 ≈ 𓇓 σιτάρι 𓇑 sitári wheat :

𒋥 SUD2 sud₂ ŠÌTA ŠITA3 grind

𒈥 MaRad ⇔ 𐎶 Ma 𐎾 Ra ⇔ MAR 𒈠 𓈗

𒋥 rad ≈ 𒊏 ra ≈ 𒐺𒋰𒈫 ≈ 𒈥

𒊏 ≈ 𒐺𒋰𒈫 ⇔ 𒋥 RAD in ride 𒊏𒆠 = ra-ki

𒋥 ≠ 𒋾

𒄒𒋥𒅈𒁀𒌅 kib-rat ar-ba-tu
𒄒𒋥𒅈𒁀𒌅 the four edges (of the world)

𒊭𒋥𒍮𒊑 ša-rat zum-ri Scherer (scratch:scar=cut)
𒊭𒋥𒍮𒊑 barber, hairdresser

𒋥𒁍 raṭ-bu
𒋥𒁍 damp, fresh
